==Seal acquired from==

==Trivia==
* The Gullinbursti Sacred Seal is almost always equipped by the {{Ut|Steam Sword}}, {{Ut|Steam Lance}}, and {{Ut|Steam Axe}} generic units. The only Steam units that do not do so are {{#cargo_query:tables=MapUnits=MU,Units=U
|fields=CONCAT(' the {{(}}Ut{{!}}',U.WikiName,'{{)}} in [[',MU._pageName,'{{!}}{{(}}#invoke:GetFancyMapName{{!}}getFancyName{{!}}',MU._pageName,'{{)}}]]')
|join on=MU.Unit=U.WikiName
|where=MU.Unit LIKE 'Steam%' AND (MU.Seal!='Gullinbursti' Or MU.Seal is null)
|group by=MU._pageName
|format=li
|delimiter=, and 
}}.
{{NorseMyth|is a magical golden boar created by [[Eitri]] and [[Grim Brokkr|Brokkr]].}}
